item.title: JavaScript code snippets
item.description: Web / Browser get base URL const getBaseURL = url => url.replace(/[?#].*$/, ''); getBaseURL('http://url.com/page?name=Adam&surname=Smith'); // 'http://url.com/page' const url = new URL("https://example.com/login?user=someguy&page=news"); url.origin // "https://example.com" url.host // "example.com" url.protocol // "https:" url.pathname // "/login" url.searchParams.get('user') // "someuser" get URL parameters as object const getURLParameters = url => (url.match(/([^?=&]+)(=([^&]*))/g) || []).reduce( (a, v) => ( (a[v.slice(0, v.indexOf('='))] = v.slice(v.indexOf('=') + 1)), a ), {} ); getURLParameters('google.com'); // {} getURLParameters('http://url.com/page?name=Adam&surname=Smith'); // {name: 'Adam', surname: 'Smith'} // One line Object.
